EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Website_Open Data Platform Learn More.Confirmation - Real Time
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in ODPi
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for your interest in ODPi. We have successful added you to our communications list. We will also continue to share information through the odpi.org <http://odpi.org/> website so please keep checking back for more information.
Best, The ODPi Team
